name: Studio Photo Shoot with Three Sharks Players
description: Stand a chance to win a studio photo shoot with three Sharks players. You can invite three of your friends to join as you meet and pose with the Sharks players for a chance to immortalize the moment with a professional photo shoot. Everyone who places a bid on Tuesday, 3 August, will be eligible to win this NFT. Winners of the NFT are free to trade the NFT which could increase in value depending on the demand for such an item.
